channel.title: Posts on The RangeShifter platform
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The RangeShifter platform

item.title: News: Welcome to the RangeShifter website
item.description: Welcome to the official website of the eco-evolutionary modelling platform “RangeShifter” (Bocedi et al. 2014). We will use this site to introduce you to the different RangeShifter features and applications, provide tutorials and further details. Also, we provide links to the latest software releases of RangeShifter and the accompanying R package RangeshiftR. References Bocedi, G., S.C.F. Palmer, G. Pe’er, R.K. Heikkinen, Y.G. Matsinos, K. Watts, and J.M.J. Travis. 2014. “RangeShifter: A Platform for Modelling Spatial Eco-Evolutionary Dynamics and Species’ Responses to Environmental Changes.
